text: Kiya yeh log sirf iss amar kay muntazir hain kay inn kay pass farishtay aayen ya inn kay pass aap ka rab aaye ya aap kay rab ki koi (bari) nishani aaye? Jiss roz aap kay rab ki koi bari nishani aa phoncya gi kissi aisay shaks ka eman uss kay kaam na aaye ga jo pehlay say eman nahi rakhta. Ya uss ney apney eman mein koi nek amal na kiya ho. Aap farma dijiye kay tum muntazir raho hum bhi muntazir hain
